contact_id.description: Identifier of the electrode contact associated with this channel. Links to name column in electrodes.tsv.

patch_type.description: Type of patch clamp recording technique.

levels.CAT: Cell-attached patch: Pipette attached to cell membrane without breaking through
levels.PP: Perforated patch: Membrane perforated using antibiotic to gain electrical access
levels.WCP: Whole-cell patch: Membrane ruptured for direct intracellular access

hardware_filters.description: Name/identifier of hardware filter applied to this channel.
